resources.string: Crete a task and assign it to the right owner.
Task may be defined as deadline with specific date and time.
The deadline date appears in red colour besides the task summary.
On the deadline date notification reminders come for deadline task.
Assignee of the task is selected from the contact list and can be group also.
Selected contact should have mobile number to receive the task (contacts with only email id shall not receive it, as it is a mobile number based task management solution).
In case of group multiple tasks are created with owners as the member of group. Use this feature to allocate tasks to your complete team which is saved in the group option of phone.
Task can have urgency level as Low/Medium/High/Fire.
If assignee does not have the application to receive task via application then shall receive it via SMS which is sent from assigner’s mobile only. Charges for sending sms will be as per your plan.
Tasks shall of three categories-(filter these out by using filter options on top).
Self- created by you for you.
Received- created by someone else for you e.g. your boss or your team members.
Assigned- created by you for someone else e.g. task assigned by you to your team members.
Appears in chronological sequence. Latest (new/updated) appears on top Sync of tasks happen in 30 seconds but on demand can be done via Menu option.
Can view contact wise task summary for received as well as assigned tasks.
Can sort tasks on basis of Name/Priority/ Date (default).

Task received from a contact number which is not in contact list of user will go in UnKnown tasks.Concept is that if you do not has some one’s number in your contact list then you do not expect a task from that person also. This way cluttering of tasks summary is protected.
Closed tasks can be viewed by clicking “close” state in menu options.
Tasks can be filtered out on following options from the top bar, which could be combination of these:
Tasks with urgency level as fire.
Can assign urgency of task as fire by clicking fire icon and assignee will see fire against the task.
Fire tasks can be filtered out by clicking icon on top.

Use closely watched icon to focus on tasks which you want to focus upon. Closely watched is for self control only and is not visible to assignee. This is useful when you have too many tasks to manage.
Closely watched can be filtered out by clicking icon on top.
Can communicate with assignor/assignee using messaging option.
This way can pass on message/clarification/reminder.
Can view summary of exchanged messages.
By sending a message an old task can be pushed on top in assignee’s summary.
Can close a task by clicking check box
Closed tasks can be viewed by clicking Close state in menu option.
Tasks once clicked for closing appears strike off for 10 sec and then it moves to closed section.
Task closed by assignee, appears as strike off in open list to assignor for 24 hrs after closing but can be moved to close list by clicking “close” action.
Following actions are also possible on task:
Why task/task message created by me is not visible to assignee.Task/task message will not be visible to assignee in following scenarios:
Task is still lying within your application as you are not internet connected. Connect to internet and within 30sec it goes out
Assignee is not internet connected. Connect to internet and within 30sec shall receive it.
Contact chosen as assignee is having only email id/facebook/linkedin Id etc but not mobile number. Select the correct contact with mobile number

What will happen to assigned task if assignee is not having the mAssigner application.Assignee in this case will receive SMS of the task along with a link to download this application.SMS will be sent via you mobile phone only so the SMS charges as per your plan will apply

What charges shall be applicable if I send tasks to my colleagues who are internationally located?Application works on internet so no charges will apply if assignee has assigner application to receive it. Otherwise SMS will be sent and charges as per your plan will apply.

Why I am unable to change urgency level to fire for few tasks?These tasks are assigned by someone who can only modify urgency level. Use “closely watched” feature to make it a high priority item for you.
Why I am unable to edit or redefine deadline or reassign the task in few cases?These tasks are assigned by someone who as owner can only modify it

Task marked as closely watched by me will be visible as closely watched to the assignee or assignor also? No, closely watched is for only your prioritization so view of others will not be impacted if you mark any tasks as closely watched.
From where can I access closed tasks ?From menu options:
Sync happens at what frequency?At every 1 minute but can use sync option from menu for instant one
From where I can view all the tasks sent by someone Use “sort by name” option from menuUse “contact wise summary” option from menu
Though I chose priority level while creating a task but where is it being used except for the tasks with urgency as fire?Use “sort by priority” option from menu to view task as per priority
How to send reminder to the assignee of taskUse messaging option to sent reminder and a request to expediteTask with a new message comes on top, this way is more prominently visible to assignee.

By using this application someone can bombard me with tasks and choke my working area.We have put a protection that messages from unknown mobile number (i.e. from a mobile number which is not in contact list ) go to UnKnown section.
Please set the %1$s constant and recompile the app.
Device is already registered on server.
From GCM: server deleted %1$d pending messages!
Trying (attempt %1$d/%2$d) to register device on Demo Server.
From Demo Server: successfully added device!
From Demo Server: successfully removed device!
Could not register device on Demo Server after %1$d attempts.
Could not unregister device on Demo Server (%1$s).
